name: Apperception
description: Apperception is a survival horror VR experience in which you must hide from the grotesque monsters that wonder the halls of The Tower. Make your way through the cursed regions to find your freedom, lest they find you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better. Storage: 400 MB available space
